text: William Rex Austin (23 May 1931 â€“ 23 June 2022) was a New Zealand politician of the National Party. He was born in Riverton, New Zealand. Austin was a member of the New Zealand Parliament between 1975 to 1987. Austin died on 23 June 2022 in Invercargill, New Zealand at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2022 deaths Category:New Zealand politicians
title: Rex Austin
